song.title: To a Far Away Friend
song.info: Composed by me in 2003. Tracked for PostMODism musicdisk in 2005. Dedicated to old friend whose birthday I missed a few years. Also dedicated to my wife Helen, this song was composed the night before our wedding anniversary, so I played this tune next morning for her. Useless present, isn't it? Bass was made in Psycle Tracker, guitars recorded with M-Audio DUO. Drums are sampled from audio tape, loops rendered in Impulse Tracker. 4 channel Amiga MOD as a result.
